Description: TL12 Leather briefcase, 'Success' Delivery by Father's Day (June 19th) guaranteed with EXPEDITED shipping ($32.00) if payment received by 6/11/2017 Look below for more details about our shipping guarantee Black leather shows off its smooth, supple beauty in a handsome briefcase of modern design. Ricardo Hinojosa adorns the flap with attractive topstitching. An outer pocket runs the width of the back and closes with a magnetic button, while a long zipper pocket can be found beneath the flap. Inside, a zipper pocket, an open pouch and compartments for three pens or pencils keep everything organized for success. Artist: Ricardo Hinojosa MORE FROM THIS ARTIST Item Details Size Briefcase: 10.8 inches H x 15.0 inches W x 2.8 inches D Strap: 34.5 inches min L - x 46.0 inches max L x 1.2 inches W Strap drop length: 18.0 inches from strap to bag Weight 1.81 pounds Materials Leather. Cotton and polyester lining Additional Info Adjustable strap(s) Features a magnetic snap closure Detachable shoulder strap(s) Genuine leather may naturally show subtle marks, scratches or wrinkles Photos are representative of the item being offered, but are not necessarily of the exact item you would receive. As is the nature of handcrafted items, there may be very slight variations from one piece to the next. See Listing InfoCURRENT PRICE: US $302.95SUGGESTED RETAIL Our ebay prices are significantly lower than suggested retail amounts. By cutting out all traditional middlemen we can bring you the best prices on the highest quality items, direct from the region of origin. For USA (50 states): Shipping costs cover all import fees. Sales tax will be added for all items shipped to California or Texas. Orders with Expedited shipping and those shipping outside the USA require a physical address. Sorry, we are not able to ship to APO/FPO addresses at this time. For expedited or international shipping fees, you must manually "Add" the additional amount when paying by Paypal. For example, if you want the 8.00 Expedited shipping and the Standard shipping is 5.00, you must "Add" an additional 3.00 to your payment. Payment Information All major credit cards accepted. Paypal accepted. Personal checks and cash will NOT be accepted Payment must be made within 7 business days. No offers lower than the starting bid price will be accepted. So please do not submit such requests. Positive feedback will be given within 20 days after you have received the item. To pay through NOVICA's secure website, check your email for instructions - these will be sent within 24 hours of auction closing to the email address registered with eBay. Biography of Ricardo Hinojosa "I believe today's fashions require innovative and daring designs, and this is what I aim to do with my work." "Hola!
